channel.title: Comments on: Daemon by Daniel Suarez is a book every programmer will love
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: andy matthews
item.dc:creator: andy matthews
item.content:encoded:
Daemon is indeed and awesome book, as is Freedom. Both really well written, on the edge of your seat cyber-thrillers.

BTW, Leinad Zeraus is Daniel Suarez backwards in case you didn’t see it.
